attributes.action: Distance Home Office from unpopular prisoner-release decisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Politicians currently face grey, if not illegal, release-refusal of, typically, high-profile criminals.

Current politicians will NEVER release Ian Brady... as-&-when Danno Sonnex & Nigel Farmer approach release 30-years hence then PM, HO minister... will claim 'too-dangerous to be released'.

However unpleasant, these & others [burglars, violent-thugs] to be released under-licence; track MunicipalDB... 24x7 real-time.

rejection.details: The statements in the extra detail of your petition cannot be verified so the petition cannot be accepted as currently worded.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
